title: [Large-scale] Application of Instructional Theory Frameworks for Digital Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology knowledge and digital tool application experience
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to systematically apply instructional theory frameworks when designing digital learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply six principles (system understanding, design fundamentals, methodological neutrality, design triangle, method-medium distinction, awareness of personal theory) when developing projects in digital learning design.
Learners can design and evaluate digital learning experiences specialized for language subjects based on instructional theory frameworks.
Learners can plan a flexible schedule centered on formative assessment for small learner groups in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
